item.title: How Can i Add Commands On My RichScape Server
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Newty:

The commands are still the same. The only difference is you need to use “c.” To add an item for example, c.addItem(9999, 1).

Well, you have to make sure the client argument is within the parameters of the command method in that class.

public void customCommand(String command, client c) {
